objects.name: Main Entrance Gate
objects.desc: This is the front entrance of the school it is beside Mcdonalds and the front of PTC Building.

objects.name: CSDL Department
objects.desc: The Center for Student Development and Leadership (CSDL) isa the department where the Head Deanâ€™s office, led by Adele Traspe, is located. This building also serves as the venue for submitting HK scholarship requirements.

objects.name: FVR Building
objects.desc: The FVR (Fidel V. Ramos) Building is built in honor of the former President Fidel V. Ramos. A museum in his honor and houses the University Library. It also houses the different administrative offices namely Office of the University President, COO and ACOO, the marketing department, University Research Center, Accounting section and the Registrar's office.

objects.name: University Library Building
objects.desc: University Library located in second floor the FVR Building. Students can go here to read books and focus on studying.

objects.name: CMA Building Entrance near Registrar
objects.desc: CMA Building (College of Management and Accountancy) used by various courses under the department of Management and Accountancy such as tourism, accountancy and hospitality management. It also houses all modern laboratories for the CMA department. A banquet hall to cater different occasions and events in the University.

objects.name: CMA's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the CMA Building.

objects.name: CMA Building Entrance Near PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: CMA Building (College of Management and Accountancy) used by various courses under the department of Management and Accountancy such as tourism, accountancy and hospitality management. It also houses all modern laboratories for the CMA department. A banquet hall to cater different occasions and events in the University.

objects.name: BASIC ED Building
objects.desc: This building is used by senior high school students. The building is also used as the claiming center for printed modules.

objects.name: BASIC ED's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: CCJE Department
objects.desc: Formerly the CHS (College of Health Sciences) building now renovated to cater the rooms needed by the CELA department. This Building is used by Education and Criminology students. The building also houses the University Amphitheater.

objects.name: CCJE's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located on the second floor.

objects.name: Gymnasium
objects.desc: It is utilized for various activities, including department events, scholarship meetings, basketball, volleyball, and more. The seating can accommodate up to two thousand people.

objects.name: Gymnasium's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located on the first floor.

objects.name: Student Plaza Entrance Near CMA Hall
objects.desc: The Student Plaza (SP) offers a variety of food options, including burgers, rice-based meals, pasta, and more. This area also serves as a venue for events, such as booths and other activities.

objects.name: Student Plaza Entrance Near PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: The Student Plaza (SP) offers a variety of food options, including burgers, rice-based meals, pasta, and more. This area also serves as a venue for events, such as booths and other activities.

objects.name: Technical Vocational Building
objects.desc: This building is used by technical vocational strand students from the basic education or senior high school.

objects.name: North Hall Entrance 1
objects.desc: The North Hall Building where most Gen-Ed subject rooms for SHS, BS Education and Laboratory rooms for Architecture students are stationed. This is the only building in the University that has no Admin office or faculty room for departments.

objects.name: North Hall's Comfort Room 1
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: North Hall's Comfort Room 2
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: North Hall Entrance 2
objects.desc: The North Hall Building where most Gen-Ed subject rooms for SHS, BS Education and Laboratory rooms for Architecture students are stationed. This is the only building in the University that has no Admin office or faculty room for departments.

objects.name: PHINMA Forest
objects.desc: This area is for giving relaxation for everyone whether you need to eat somewhere, or study. it is also used for events.

objects.name: MBA Engineering Building
objects.desc: The MBA Building is a five floor building, with the AVR (Audio Visual Room) located at the fifth floor.The University Chapel at the 3rd Floor and the University Clinic located at the ground floor. It also houses the laboratory rooms for Engineering and Criminal Justice programs. The building is commonly used for Gen-Ed subjects under CCJE and CEA departments. Additionally, the CCJE and CEA faculty rooms are located in the building.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 1
objects.desc: The MBA Building is a five floor building, with the AVR (Audio Visual Room) located at the fifth floor.The University Chapel at the 3rd Floor and the University Clinic located at the ground floor. It also houses the laboratory rooms for Engineering and Criminal Justice programs. The building is commonly used for Gen-Ed subjects under CCJE and CEA departments. Additionally, the CCJE and CEA faculty rooms are located in the building.

objects.name: MBA Hall's Comfort Room 1
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.desc: The MBA Building is a five floor building, with the AVR (Audio Visual Room) located at the fifth floor.The University Chapel at the 3rd Floor and the University Clinic located at the ground floor. It also houses the laboratory rooms for Engineering and Criminal Justice programs. The building is commonly used for Gen-Ed subjects under CCJE and CEA departments. Additionally, the CCJE and CEA faculty rooms are located in the building.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 3
objects.desc: The MBA Building is a five floor building, with the AVR (Audio Visual Room) located at the fifth floor.The University Chapel at the 3rd Floor and the University Clinic located at the ground floor. It also houses the laboratory rooms for Engineering and Criminal Justice programs. The building is commonly used for Gen-Ed subjects under CCJE and CEA departments. Additionally, the CCJE and CEA faculty rooms are located in the building.

objects.name: University Chapel
objects.desc: You can go here to pray. Located the 3rd floor

objects.name: University Clinic
objects.desc: You can go here if you ever need medical assistance. Located at the first floor.

objects.name: MBA Hall Entrance 4
objects.desc: The MBA Building is a five floor building, with the AVR (Audio Visual Room) located at the fifth floor.The University Chapel at the 3rd Floor and the University Clinic located at the ground floor. It also houses the laboratory rooms for Engineering and Criminal Justice programs. The building is commonly used for Gen-Ed subjects under CCJE and CEA departments. Additionally, the CCJE and CEA faculty rooms are located in the building.

objects.name: Riverside Building
objects.desc: The Riverside building is the home of the allied health courses of University Of Pangasinan. Modern facilities for medical courses and a state of the art mock hospital is stationed in this building. It also Features the Food Hub on the 4th floor, Modern Medical Laboratories and Faculty offices for CAHS (College of Allied Health Sciences) and CAS (College of Arts and Sciences). The Riverside Building was built in the year 2022.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Comfort Room near Parking Lot
objects.desc: Located at the first floor near the parking lot.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Parking Lot Area
objects.desc: Located at the ground floor of the Riverside Building.

objects.name: Riverside Building's Food Plaza
objects.desc: There are many stalls that serve food and drinks here. look at building information for more details.

objects.name: Teller
objects.desc: The Teller's Office, located next to the Registrarâ€™s office, is where you can make in-person payments for tuition, registration fees, grade copy fees, and other school-related charges. This office handles all physical transactions for student fees and services.

objects.name: Finance Purchasing Department
objects.desc: This is where the finance department is located.

objects.name: Atrium
objects.desc: Atrium Features a scenery above the Entrance of the school where you can take pictures.

objects.name: Registrar Office
objects.desc: The Registrar's Office, situated on the ground floor of the FVR Building, provides important student services. Here, you can request official copies of your grades, Form 137 or 138, diploma, and obtain school stamps for various documents.The office also assists with academic records and other enrollment-related needs.

objects.name: Pedestrian Entrance/Exit
objects.desc: The exit is located at the back of the school and located aside from a hospital.

objects.name: OP/Marketing Department
objects.desc: This is where the Marketing Department is located.

objects.name: Old Stage
objects.desc: This is our old stage. student use it for practice for their performance tasks, etc.

objects.name: Mc Donald's
objects.desc: Where you can go to eat McDonalds. it is located near the front entrance. there is also an entrance from inside the school.

objects.name: ITS Department Building
objects.desc: ITS Department (Information Technology Services ) situated on the second floor of the building. The CSDL (Center for Student Development and Leadership ) is located at the ground floor of the building. Also, where students can go to address concerns related to technical assistance, such as issues with their PHINMA account.

objects.name: College of Law Office
objects.desc: This where the College of Law Office is Located. it is near the Library at the second floor.

objects.name: Office of Graduate and Professionals
objects.desc: Located beside the College of Law Office.

objects.name: PEDRO Hub Office
objects.desc: Located on the ground floor of the FVR. Located near the Registrar.

objects.name: College of Management and Accounting (CMA) Office
PTC Building
objects.desc: Also known as the PHINMA Training Center building - used by IT students where facilities like iMac laboratory and Windows Based computer laboratories are stationed. Also, the CITE (College of Information Technology Education) faculty room is situated in it, along with a mock courtroom  and a Law Library for law students, these are the facilities stationed in the building

objects.name: PTC's Comfort Room
objects.desc: Located at the 3rd floor of the PTC Building.

objects.name: 4 wheels parking area
objects.desc: Located at the front of the FVR.

objects.desc: Located in front of the Basic ED Building.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of Basic Ed.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of CCJE.
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the CCJE Building.

objects.name: Motorcycle parking right side of Gymnasium.
objects.desc: Located at the right side of the Gymnasium.

objects.name: General Services Department(GSD) Office
objects.desc: You can go here to ask for general information etc.

objects.name: Uniform Claiming Area
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the FVR Building. you can claim the uniforms here.

objects.name: Module Claiming Area
objects.desc: Located at the first floor of the Basic Ed Building. You can claim your modules here for the semester.

objects.name: Phinma Forest Pond
objects.desc: Where you can relax and admire the view of the pond and it's inhabitants.

objects.name: Student Plaza's Food Place
objects.desc: You can go here to get food and drinks.

objects.name: University Canteen
objects.desc: You can go here to get food and drinks.

objects.name: College of Allied Health And Sciences (CAHS) Office
objects.desc: Located at the second floor of the Riverside Building.

objects.name: MBA Hall's Comfort Room 2
objects.desc: Located at the first floor.

objects.name: Phinma Avenue
objects.desc: Located at the middle of the school, in front of the MBA Hall.

objects.desc: Located at the 4th floor of the MBA Hall.

objects.name: College of Engineering And Achitecture (CEA) Office
objects.desc: Located at the 3rd floor of the MBA Engineering.

objects.name: College of Information Technology Education (CITE) Office
objects.desc: Located at the 4th floor of the PTC Building.
